name: daveenci-crm
description: A simple, clean CRM system built with React, Node.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm start --prefix src"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix src
scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix src
scripts.render:deploy: npm run setup && npm run render:deploy --prefix server

author: Daveenci
